metadata.name: Black Avenger
metadata.description:
She knows of my betrayal, and she will follow me wherever I go.  
I thought I had sent her on a mission from which she could not return alive,  
She came back as if nothing had happened, and began to hunt me down slowly and steadily.  
Traps and soldiers were of no use against her.  
Most frightening of all, she is not in a hurry.  
She comes at me slowly and surely.  
I guess she wants to have all the fun she can until I give up...

-----------------------------------------------------------------------


私の裏切りを知った彼女は何処までも追って来る。  
彼女は生還不可能な作戦に送り込んだ筈なのに、  
何事も無かった様に帰って来ると私をジワジワと追い詰め始めた。  
トラップも兵士も彼女相手には何の役にも立たない  
何より恐ろしいのは彼女は焦ったりしない  
ゆっくりと確実に迫って来る。  
私が観念するまで楽しみ尽くす気なのだろう…
